resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The crossed scepter is another item remaining both that he aims to rule the world and spread the faith.
resource.chars: The crossed scepter is another item remaining both that he aims to rule the world and spread the faith.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: By pointing at the Christ, he creates a link between the top and the bottom characters, thus symbolizing the main role the Church has between the terrestrial world and the celestial one.
resource.chars: By pointing at the Christ, he creates a link between the top and the bottom characters, thus symbolizing the main role the Church has between the terrestrial world and the celestial one.
